drive.title: My Drive
drive.emptyStateDescription: Upload files or create folders to get started
drive.name: Name
drive.uploadToFolder: Select files to upload to this folder
drive.uploadToRoot: Select files to upload to My Drive
drive.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select
drive.createFolderInFolder: Create a new folder in this folder
drive.createFolderInRoot: Create a new folder in My Drive
drive.shareDescription: Anyone with this link can access the file
drive.linkExpiry: This link will expire in 24 hours
drive.renameDescription: Enter a new name for the file
drive.sharedEmptyDescription: Files shared with you by others will appear here
drive.recentEmptyDescription: Files you've recently opened or modified will appear here
drive.starredEmptyDescription: Star files and folders to find them easily later
drive.trashEmptyDescription: Items you delete will appear here
